testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlRampMeterStatusRequest dialog as an OC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.5.9.3 [Need to Share Ramp Meter Status] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Device Status is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.3.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N79R394_Restrictions___Device_Status_Supported = ${TMDD_N79R394_Restrictions___Device_Status_Supported}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Unique Identifier of the Controlling Center is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.3.1.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N79R395_Unique_Identifier_of_the_Controlling_Center_Supported = ${TMDD_N79R395_Unique_Identifier_of_the_Controlling_Center_Supported}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Communications Status is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.3.1.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N79R396_Device_Communications_Status_Supported = ${TMDD_N79R396_Device_Communications_Status_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Operator Identifier - Device Status is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.3.1.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N79R397_Operator_Identifier___Device_Status_Supported = ${TMDD_N79R397_Operator_Identifier___Device_Status_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Event Identifier - Device Status is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.3.1.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N79R398_Event_Identifier___Device_Status_Supported = ${TMDD_N79R398_Event_Identifier___Device_Status_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Event Response Plan - Device Status is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.3.1.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N79R399_Event_Response_Plan___Device_Status_Supported = ${TMDD_N79R399_Event_Response_Plan___Device_Status_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Status Date and Time Change Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.3.1.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N79R400_Device_Status_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N79R400_Device_Status_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported}

Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Requested Metering Command Source is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.10.2.5.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N79R874_Requested_Metering_Command_Source_Supported = ${TMDD_N79R874_Requested_Metering_Command_Source_Supported}

Step 10 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Implemented Metering Command Source is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.10.2.5.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N79R875_Implemented_Metering_Command_Source_Supported = ${TMDD_N79R875_Implemented_Metering_Command_Source_Supported}

Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Implemented Plan is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.10.2.5.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N79R876_Implemented_Plan_Supported = ${TMDD_N79R876_Implemented_Plan_Supported}

Step 12 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Implemented Rate is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.10.2.5.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N79R877_Implemented_Rate_Supported = ${TMDD_N79R877_Implemented_Rate_Supported}

Step 13 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Implemented Vehicles Per Green is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.10.2.5.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N79R878_Implemented_Vehicles_Per_Green_Supported = ${TMDD_N79R878_Implemented_Vehicles_Per_Green_Supported}

Step 14 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Requested Action is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.10.2.5.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N79R879_Requested_Action_Supported = ${TMDD_N79R879_Requested_Action_Supported}

Step 15 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Requested Plan - Ramp Meter Status is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.10.2.5.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N79R880_Requested_Plan___Ramp_Meter_Status_Supported = ${TMDD_N79R880_Requested_Plan___Ramp_Meter_Status_Supported}

Step 16 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Requested Rate - Ramp Meter Status is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.10.2.5.2.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N79R881_Requested_Rate___Ramp_Meter_Status_Supported = ${TMDD_N79R881_Requested_Rate___Ramp_Meter_Status_Supported}

Step 17 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Requested Vehicles Per Green is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.10.2.5.2.9). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N79R882_Requested_Vehicles_Per_Green_Supported = ${TMDD_N79R882_Requested_Vehicles_Per_Green_Supported}

Step 18 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Operational Minimum Metering Rate is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.10.2.5.2.10). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N79R883_Operational_Minimum_Metering_Rate_Supported = ${TMDD_N79R883_Operational_Minimum_Metering_Rate_Supported}

Step 19 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Operational Maximum Metering Rate is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.10.2.5.2.11). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N79R884_Operational_Maximum_Metering_Rate_Supported = ${TMDD_N79R884_Operational_Maximum_Metering_Rate_Supported}

Step 20 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Demand Detector Status is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.10.2.5.2.12). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N79R885_Demand_Detector_Status_Supported = ${TMDD_N79R885_Demand_Detector_Status_Supported}

Step 21 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Passage Detector Status is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.10.2.5.2.13). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N79R886_Passage_Detector_Status_Supported = ${TMDD_N79R886_Passage_Detector_Status_Supported}

Step 22 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Queue Detector Status is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.10.2.5.2.14). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N79R887_Queue_Detector_Status_Supported = ${TMDD_N79R887_Queue_Detector_Status_Supported}

Step 23 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Cycle Count is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.10.2.5.2.15). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N79R888_Cycle_Count_Supported = ${TMDD_N79R888_Cycle_Count_Supported}

Step 24 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Passenger Vehicle Count is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.10.2.5.2.16). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N79R889_Passenger_Vehicle_Count_Supported = ${TMDD_N79R889_Passenger_Vehicle_Count_Supported}

Step 25 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Queue Detected Flag is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.10.2.5.2.17). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N79R890_Queue_Detected_Flag_Supported = ${TMDD_N79R890_Queue_Detected_Flag_Supported}

Step 26 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Violation Vehicle Count is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.10.2.5.2.18). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N79R891_Violation_Vehicle_Count_Supported = ${TMDD_N79R891_Violation_Vehicle_Count_Supported}

Step 27 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Mainline Flow Rate is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.10.2.5.2.19). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N79R892_Mainline_Flow_Rate_Supported = ${TMDD_N79R892_Mainline_Flow_Rate_Supported}

Step 28 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Mainline Vehicle Occupancy is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.10.2.5.2.20). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N79R893_Mainline_Vehicle_Occupancy_Supported = ${TMDD_N79R893_Mainline_Vehicle_Occupancy_Supported}

Step 29 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Mainline Vehicle Speed is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.10.2.5.2.21). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N79R894_Mainline_Vehicle_Speed_Supported = ${TMDD_N79R894_Mainline_Vehicle_Speed_Supported}
Step 30 CONFIGURE: Define the message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: RequestMessage: ${RequestMessage}
Step 31 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorResponseExpected: ${ErrorResponseExpected}
Step 32 CONFIGURE: IF ErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorTypeExpected: ${ErrorTypeExpected}

Step 33 REQUEST-RESPONSE-EC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlRampMeterStatusRequest RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N79R868_Send_Ramp_Meter_Status_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter REQUESTMESSAGE = RequestMessage ERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = ErrorResponseExpected ERRORTYPEEXPECTED = ErrorTypeExpected
Step 34 IF ErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.1 VERIFY that element metered-lane-status-header exists within each instance of rampMeterStatusMsg.ramp-meter-status-item.metered-status-list.metered-lane
Step 34.2 VERIFY that element device-status-header exists within each instance of rampMeterStatusMsg.ramp-meter-status-item
Step 34.3 VERIFY that element metered-lane-status-header exists within each instance of rampMeterStatusMsg.ramp-meter-status-item.metered-status-list.metered-lane
Step 34.4 VERIFY that element organization-information exists within each instance of rampMeterStatusMsg.ramp-meter-status-item.metered-status-list.metered-lane.metered-lane-status-header
Step 34.5 VERIFY that element device-id exists within each instance of rampMeterStatusMsg.ramp-meter-status-item.metered-status-list.metered-lane.metered-lane-status-header
Step 34.6 VERIFY that element device-status exists within each instance of rampMeterStatusMsg.ramp-meter-status-item.metered-status-list.metered-lane.metered-lane-status-header
Step 34.7 VERIFY that element rampMeterStatusMsg exists.
Step 34.8 VERIFY that element device-status-header exists within each instance of rampMeterStatusMsg.ramp-meter-status-item
Step 34.9 VERIFY that element metered-lane-status-header exists within each instance of rampMeterStatusMsg.ramp-meter-status-item.metered-status-list.metered-lane
Step 34.10 VERIFY that element meter-implemented-action exists within each instance of rampMeterStatusMsg.ramp-meter-status-item.metered-status-list.metered-lane
Step 34.11 IF TMDD_N79R394_Restrictions___Device_Status_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.11.1 VERIFY that element restrictions exists within each instance of rampMeterStatusMsg.ramp-meter-status-item.metered-status-list.metered-lane.metered-lane-status-header
Step 34.12 IF TMDD_N79R395_Unique_Identifier_of_the_Controlling_Center_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.12.1 VERIFY that element center-id exists within each instance of rampMeterStatusMsg.ramp-meter-status-item.metered-status-list.metered-lane.metered-lane-status-header
Step 34.13 IF TMDD_N79R396_Device_Communications_Status_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.13.1 VERIFY that element device-comm-status exists within each instance of rampMeterStatusMsg.ramp-meter-status-item.metered-status-list.metered-lane.metered-lane-status-header
Step 34.14 IF TMDD_N79R397_Operator_Identifier___Device_Status_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.14.1 VERIFY that element operator-id exists within each instance of rampMeterStatusMsg.ramp-meter-status-item.metered-status-list.metered-lane.metered-lane-status-header
Step 34.15 IF TMDD_N79R398_Event_Identifier___Device_Status_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.15.1 VERIFY that element event-id exists within each instance of rampMeterStatusMsg.ramp-meter-status-item.metered-status-list.metered-lane.metered-lane-status-header
Step 34.16 IF TMDD_N79R399_Event_Response_Plan___Device_Status_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.16.1 VERIFY that element response-plan-id exists within each instance of rampMeterStatusMsg.ramp-meter-status-item.metered-status-list.metered-lane.metered-lane-status-header
Step 34.17 IF TMDD_N79R400_Device_Status_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.17.1 VERIFY that element last-comm-time exists within each instance of rampMeterStatusMsg.ramp-meter-status-item.metered-status-list.metered-lane.metered-lane-status-header
Step 34.18 IF TMDD_N79R874_Requested_Metering_Command_Source_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.18.1 VERIFY that element requested-meter-command-source exists within each instance of rampMeterStatusMsg.ramp-meter-status-item.metered-status-list.metered-lane
Step 34.19 IF TMDD_N79R875_Implemented_Metering_Command_Source_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.19.1 VERIFY that element implemented-meter-command-source exists within each instance of rampMeterStatusMsg.ramp-meter-status-item.metered-status-list.metered-lane
Step 34.20 IF TMDD_N79R876_Implemented_Plan_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.20.1 VERIFY that element meter-implemented-plan exists within each instance of rampMeterStatusMsg.ramp-meter-status-item.metered-status-list.metered-lane
Step 34.21 IF TMDD_N79R877_Implemented_Rate_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.21.1 VERIFY that element meter-implemented-rate exists within each instance of rampMeterStatusMsg.ramp-meter-status-item.metered-status-list.metered-lane
Step 34.22 IF TMDD_N79R878_Implemented_Vehicles_Per_Green_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.22.1 VERIFY that element meter-implemented-vehicles-per-green exists within each instance of rampMeterStatusMsg.ramp-meter-status-item.metered-status-list.metered-lane
Step 34.23 IF TMDD_N79R879_Requested_Action_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.23.1 VERIFY that element meter-requested-action exists within each instance of rampMeterStatusMsg.ramp-meter-status-item.metered-status-list.metered-lane
Step 34.24 IF TMDD_N79R880_Requested_Plan___Ramp_Meter_Status_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.24.1 VERIFY that element meter-requested-plan exists within each instance of rampMeterStatusMsg.ramp-meter-status-item.metered-status-list.metered-lane
Step 34.25 IF TMDD_N79R881_Requested_Rate___Ramp_Meter_Status_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.25.1 VERIFY that element meter-requested-rate exists within each instance of rampMeterStatusMsg.ramp-meter-status-item.metered-status-list.metered-lane
Step 34.26 IF TMDD_N79R882_Requested_Vehicles_Per_Green_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.26.1 VERIFY that element meter-requested-vehicles-per-green exists within each instance of rampMeterStatusMsg.ramp-meter-status-item.metered-status-list.metered-lane
Step 34.27 IF TMDD_N79R883_Operational_Minimum_Metering_Rate_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.27.1 VERIFY that element operational-min-meter-rate exists within each instance of rampMeterStatusMsg.ramp-meter-status-item.metered-status-list.metered-lane
Step 34.28 IF TMDD_N79R884_Operational_Maximum_Metering_Rate_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.28.1 VERIFY that element operational-max-meter-rate exists within each instance of rampMeterStatusMsg.ramp-meter-status-item.metered-status-list.metered-lane
Step 34.29 IF TMDD_N79R885_Demand_Detector_Status_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.29.1 VERIFY that element meter-demand-detector-status exists within each instance of rampMeterStatusMsg.ramp-meter-status-item.metered-status-list.metered-lane
Step 34.30 IF TMDD_N79R886_Passage_Detector_Status_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.30.1 VERIFY that element meter-passage-detector-status exists within each instance of rampMeterStatusMsg.ramp-meter-status-item.metered-status-list.metered-lane
Step 34.31 IF TMDD_N79R887_Queue_Detector_Status_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.31.1 VERIFY that element meter-queue-detector-status exists within each instance of rampMeterStatusMsg.ramp-meter-status-item.metered-status-list.metered-lane
Step 34.32 IF TMDD_N79R888_Cycle_Count_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.32.1 VERIFY that element meter-cycle-count exists within each instance of rampMeterStatusMsg.ramp-meter-status-item.metered-status-list.metered-lane
Step 34.33 IF TMDD_N79R889_Passenger_Vehicle_Count_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.33.1 VERIFY that element metered-lane-vehicle-count exists within each instance of rampMeterStatusMsg.ramp-meter-status-item.metered-status-list.metered-lane
Step 34.34 IF TMDD_N79R890_Queue_Detected_Flag_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.34.1 VERIFY that element meter-queue-detected-flag exists within each instance of rampMeterStatusMsg.ramp-meter-status-item.metered-status-list.metered-lane
Step 34.35 IF TMDD_N79R891_Violation_Vehicle_Count_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.35.1 VERIFY that element metered-lane-violation-count exists within each instance of rampMeterStatusMsg.ramp-meter-status-item.metered-status-list.metered-lane
Step 34.36 IF TMDD_N79R892_Mainline_Flow_Rate_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.36.1 VERIFY that element mainline-flow-rate exists within each instance of rampMeterStatusMsg.ramp-meter-status-item
Step 34.37 IF TMDD_N79R893_Mainline_Vehicle_Occupancy_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.37.1 VERIFY that element mainline-vehicle-occupancy exists within each instance of rampMeterStatusMsg.ramp-meter-status-item
Step 34.38 IF TMDD_N79R894_Mainline_Vehicle_Speed_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.38.1 VERIFY that element mainline-vehicle-speed exists within each instance of rampMeterStatusMsg.ramp-meter-status-item
Step 34.39 VERIFY that the values within the RESPONSE message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content
